headline: Where ‘What Do You Think?’ Is Loaded
abstract: A documentary seeks to find out what people think of Jews, the Holocaust and history.
lead_paragraph: “I wonder if any of us have learned from the past,” Ofra Bloch, the director of “Afterward,” says upon hearing the agonizing story of Abir Aramin,  a 10-year-old Palestinian girl who was shot and killed by Israeli forces in 2007.
keywords: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
